text: Excellent food but poor service.

Great Location. Ancient old rooms & poor Service.

Never have we ever been into such as filthy, serivce-lacking beach resort.  The whole premises is a run-down.  The restaurants are not clean: sticky tables covered with juice stains; rotten salad, bread crumbs and fish bones seem to be part of the chairs and cushions.  Serving beverages with cracked cups/glasses which also have dead insects gluing to them.  The food is not well prepared neither fresh, including the seafood!  Annoyed to be served with stale seafood in a beach resot!  Hotel beach is decorated with trash, including broken bottles.  Guests pay 5-star-resort tariff while 1-star serive is provided.
Great Location. Ancient old rooms & poor Service.
Great premises but room was small
Don't trust the online reservation

When I walked in the lobby, it was very crowede and noisy, I saw the swimming pool from lobby, it was as crowded as disneyland, I cannot believe this is a 5 star hotel. And the swimming pool was somehow under maintance, can see the view as saw on the website. No bath tub in the bathroom. My flight was 12 noon, so I had an early breakfast at 7:20am, the breakfast time started at 7am, but it was chaos when I walked in the restaurant, staff in the restaurant were chatting, laughing, there's no Professional at all!! I was sooo disappointed at Heritance Ahungalla hotel!!!
Package holiday camp overrun with Russians
Beautiful beach, Seedy, Overpriced, with friendly but incompetant staff

I ordered my breakfast to the room which I didn't get .then they firmly apologized for not  giving me the breakfast.then asked me to have the lunch instead .then when I had the lunch asked me to pay for it .mind you I was allocated for a complimentary breakfast with the package I paid .
